sectionHeader.articles:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the articles section
**UI Location**: Track → Dig Deeper → Articles section header
**When Users See This**: When viewing the Dig Deeper page
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Articles"
sectionHeader.exploreMoreIdeas:
**Functional Purpose**: Description for the articles section when articles are available
**UI Location**: Track → Dig Deeper → Articles section header
**When Users See This**: When there are articles to display in the Dig Deeper section
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Explore more ideas about this exercise"
sectionHeader.noArticles:
**Functional Purpose**: Description for the articles section when no articles are available
**UI Location**: Track → Dig Deeper → Articles section header
**When Users See This**: When there are no articles for the current exercise in the Dig Deeper section
**Technical Context**: Variable `exerciseTitle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "There are no Articles for %{exerciseTitle}."
diggingDeeper.digDeeper:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the Dig Deeper introduction section
**UI Location**: Track → Dig Deeper (main section heading)
**When Users See This**: When an introduction is available for the Dig Deeper section
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Dig deeper"
diggingDeeper.author:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the number of authors
**UI Location**: Track → Dig Deeper → Footer (Credits component)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the footer of the Dig Deeper section
**Technical Context**: This is a singular label. The Credits component handles pluralization based on `topCount`.
**Current English**: "author"
diggingDeeper.contributor:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the number of contributors
**UI Location**: Track → Dig Deeper → Footer (Credits component)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the footer of the Dig Deeper section
**Technical Context**: This is a singular label. The Credits component handles pluralization based on `bottomCount`.
**Current English**: "contributor"
diggingDeeper.lastUpdated:
**Functional Purpose**: Timestamp indicating when the introduction was last updated
**UI Location**: Track → Dig Deeper → Footer
**When Users See This**: When an update date is available in the Dig Deeper footer
**Technical Context**: Variable `date` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "Last updated %{date}"
diggingDeeper.editViaGitHub:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to edit the content via GitHub
**UI Location**: Track → Dig Deeper → Footer (right side action button)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the footer of the Dig Deeper section
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Edit via GitHub"
diggingDeeper.linkOpensInNewTab:
**Functional Purpose**: Alt text for an icon indicating a link opens in a new tab
**UI Location**: Track → Dig Deeper → Footer (part of the "Edit via GitHub" link)
**When Users See This**: When the user hovers over or focuses on the "Edit via GitHub" link
**Technical Context**: Standard text for accessibility
**Current English**: "The link opens in a new window or tab"
